articles.content:
Yadav has been charged with plotting to assassinate Gurpatwant Singh Pannun

articles.title: How the India-Canada fallout could affect trade and immigration - BBC.com
articles.description: The stakes for both countries are high as the rift over allegations that India ran a campaign to intimidate Sikh separatists in Canada deepens.
articles.content: After a bombshell accusation from Canadian officials this week - that they believe India government agents were linked to a campaign of murder and extortion in the country - diplomatic relations hit … [+4858 chars]
